text: Ginevra Cantofoli (1618-1672) was an Italian painter. She was active in the Baroque period. ==Early life== Scena Allegorica. Date unknown. Cantofoli was born in Bologna, Italy in 1618. ==Career== Cantofoli received her training as an artist from Elisabetta Sirani in Bologna. She painted works for several churches. These works included a Last Supper for the Church of San Procolo, a St. Thomas of Villanova for San Giacomo Maggiore, and a St. Apollonia for the Church of La Morte. ==References== * Category:1618 births Category:1672 deaths Category:Artists from Bologna Category:Bolognese painters Category:17th- century Italian painters Category:Italian women painters Category:17th-century women artists
title: Ginevra Cantofoli
